mechanics.policy: Vehicles > Players. Protect vehicles at all costs.

Huge_Seaforium_Charge.name: Huge Seaforium Charge
Huge_Seaforium_Charge.spawn_location: Inside Enemy Keep (Requires Hangar Airship Drop or Gate Breach to access)
Huge_Seaforium_Charge.description: Deals massive damage to the final gate.
Huge_Seaforium_Charge.strategy: Plant at the door to the General's room.

abilities_driver.Ram: Spell ID 67796. Deals 2000 Siege Dmg to buildings. 1.5s CD.
abilities_driver.Desecration: Spell ID 414266. Creates a Shadow zone doing damage (Replaces Mortar in 3.3.5a).

abilities.Glaive_Throw: Spell ID 67034. Long range siege damage.

Demolisher.name: Demolisher
Demolisher.passenger_behavior: Cast class spells (Ranged DPS prefered). Protect Driver.

combat.rule: Ignore player combat unless defending a Vehicle.
combat.zerg_logic: Do not fight in the Field of Strife. Fight at the Workshop or Docks.
combat.vehicle_drivers: Do not chase kills. Hit the GATE.

movement.bomb_running: If foot soldier, grab bombs and run to gate. Ignore PvP.

Seat_1_Turret.action: Use Fire Cannon on Players/Walls. Use Steam Blast to peel melee off the engine.

Seat_2_3_Flame.action: Spam Flame Turret on nearby infantry to protect the vehicle.

Seat_1_2.action: Cast Class Spells. Protect the vehicle from melee attackers. Repair if Engineer.

Workshop.strategy: Get Siege Engine. Shield it. Drive to gate. Users pick up bombs.

Docks.strategy: Get Glaives. Protect them constantly. Range down the gate.

Hangar.strategy: Airship drop behind gates. Sabotage from inside.

Refinery_Quarry.strategy: Take if free. Do not fight for these.

Alliance.tactics: Docks Rush. Secure Glaives. Escort Glaives to West Gate. Destroy Gate. Kill General.

Horde.tactics: Workshop Rush. Secure Siege Engines. Escort to Front Gate. Destroy Gate. Kill General.
